spanGrp.span: There is a big difference between our language and Russian language.
bizım o urus diliinän šei bizım dildä čoğ raznitsa var čoğ
We studied Russian language at school.
At home we were speaking our language.
školadan čıhierdıh ävä gidierdıh bizım dildän söilierdıh
When we were playing with children we were speaking our language.
ušahlarınanda oinierdıh genä bizım dildän söilierdıh
sora ki ambelä išlär nu olier
In short, there is a very big difference.
When we don’t know many Urum words we use Russian words.
šindi bizım dildän čoğ sözi bülmierıh urus dilındä urus dilıni ğatierıh ičınä
näblem anelä olier bizım šei dil
